title: Feeling paw-ly: Dog dressed as an ambulance howls like a siren
text:
A dog who was dressed up as an ambulance for Halloween took his costume to the next level when he howled along with a siren in adorable footage.

In the clip, River, from Canada, is dressed in a handmade ambulance costume, complete with a flashing red collar and a siren track playing in the background.

But after a few moments, and with some encouragement from his owner Aliyah Buksh, the Australian Shepherd decides to take over.

River, who is also wearing a red bandanna as part of his Halloween costume, lifts his head to the ceiling as he howls along with the track.

In the clip, River, from Canada, is dressed in a handmade ambulance costume, complete with a flashing red collar and a siren track playing in the background

As he continues, Ms Buksh moves to film his costume, which is a Styrofoam box designed to look like an ambulance.

River stops his siren imitation for a moment to check what she is doing. But as soon as his owner turns the camera back to his face, he starts again, his head snapping back to look up at the ceiling.

In the caption of the clip, which was posted to Instagram, Ms Buksh wrote: 'River the pawmedic is currently accepting invitations for Halloween'.

The video has since been posted to the Twitter account We Rate Dogs, where it has been liked more than 206,000 times and viewed 8.2million times.
description: In the clip, River, from Canada, is dressed in a handmade ambulance costume, complete with a flashing red collar and a siren track playing in the background.
